solution_line_template: She needs this many cupcakes to feed everyone in class {num_students} + {num_teachers} = <<{num_students}+{num_teachers}+{num_aids}={total_people}>>{total_people}.
With the {num_sick} students calling in sick, there are this many people in class today {total_people} - {num_sick} = <<{total_people}-{num_sick}={people_present}>>{people_present}.
There are this many cupcakes left after everyone gets one {total_cupcakes} - {people_present} = <<{total_cupcakes}-{people_present}={cupcakes_left}>>{cupcakes_left} cupcakes.
